"""

import random
import string



[docs]def main(args, extra):

    punctuation = "!#$%&()*+,-./:;<=>?@^_{|}~"
    choices = string.ascii_letters + string.digits + punctuation
    selected = [random.SystemRandom().choice(choices) for _ in range(50)]
    generated_key = "".join(selected)
    print(generated_key)
